attributes.action: Introduce a right to recall the Mayor of London between elections
attributes.background: We call on the Government to introduce legislation that allows Londoners to trigger a recall process for the Mayor of London, similar to the Recall of MPs Act 2015. This would give voters the power to petition for a recall election if there is widespread dissatisfaction with the Mayor’s performance.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/735260
